bug.author: gpang
bug.summary: NPE during attachdb if ownerType is null
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.1.2 Describe the bug If the hive database ownerType is null, it causes a NPE, and fails to attach the db. The output is something like: <denchmark-code>Failed to connect underDb for Alluxio db 'test_db': null </denchmark-code>
To Reproduce Hive database ownerType is an optional field and may be null. When this happens, attaching a db fails. Expected behavior Attach should still be successful. Urgency Critical, to be able to attach a db.
